Cosmology Winter Term 2013

Course summary

More information will appear here closer to the time

Web page for Andrew Jaffe's 2012 cosmology course

The cosmos is all that is or ever was or ever will be.
Our feeblest contemplations of the Cosmos stir us -
there is a tingling in the spine, a catch in the voice, a faint sensation,
as if a distant memory, or falling from a height.
We know we are approaching the greatest of mysteries.
- Carl Sagan, Cosmos

Last Updated: 17 May 2012
